scripts.pods: cd packages && cd mobile && yarn pods
scripts.icons: cd packages && cd mobile && yarn icons
scripts.start:mobile: cd packages && cd mobile && yarn start
scripts.start:web: cd packages && cd web && yarn start
scripts.run:ios: cd packages && cd mobile && yarn ios
scripts.run:android: cd packages && cd mobile && yarn android
scripts.build:android: cd packages && cd mobile && yarn build:android
scripts.build:android:apk: cd packages && cd mobile && yarn build:android:apk
